recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of shrimp, peeled and deveined| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 15; Measure out 15 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of lemon juice| Measurement; 28; Measure out 28 grams of butter| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of salt| Measurement; 1; Measure out 1 gram of black pepper| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of fresh parsley, chopped| Untimed; None; Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat| Untimed; None; Add garlic to the skillet and cook until fragrant| Untimed; None; Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink| Untimed; None; Stir in lemon juice, butter, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Cook until shrimp are fully cooked through| Untimed; None; Garnish with fresh parsley| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Garlic Shrimp
